Description.Text: Euroxenia Royal Mare is a family-friendly 4-star hotel offering modern accommodation on St Nicolas beach in Arkassa, in southwest Karpathos. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, two restaurants and a bar. Arkassa is a small traditional town, flanked by the sandy St Nicolas beach and boasting a selection of taverns and shops. Nearby places of interest include Finiki beach, Kato Giri-Agios park and Agia Sofia Paleokastro. The hotel is housed in six modern low-rise buildings. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, children's swimming pool, children's playground and a private beach area. Guests can also play beach volleyball, bocce and ping pong. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Studios are decorated in a modern style with tiled floors and dark wood furniture. They feature a well equipped kitchenette and a balcony or terrace with a sea or garden view. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, fridge and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower or bathtub with integrated shower. The main restaurant and the pool restaurant serve Greek cuisine. Snacks and drinks are available from the beach snack bar. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. There is also an onsite supermarket. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
